img_above_text:
# Yellowbrow
Yellowbrow is a required Yaoguai King fight that you can encounter at the end of Chapter 3 in Black Myth Wukong. Located at the end of the New Thunderclap Temple, you'll have to defeat him twice in a drawn out battle to claim the Sage's Relic he guards.
* Rewards: Cosmo Radiance, Cold Iron Leaves x3, Fine Gold Thread x2, Gold Tree Core, Refined Iron Sand x2, Mind Core, 4330 Experience, 2267 Will
## Yellowbrow Boss Fight (Second Encounter)

After 2-3 heavy hits (or a single heavy strike with 3 focus points), his golden protection will shatter, and leave Yellowbrow stunned for an extended period of time.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game Black Myth Wukong, specifically during the second encounter of the Yellowbrow boss fight. The player character is engaged in combat with Yellowbrow, who is a Yaoguai King that must be defeated to progress in the game. The setting appears to be inside the New Thunderclap Temple, with intricate decorations and a statue visible in the background. The interface shows the player's health and abilities, indicating a strategic battle where breaking Yellowbrow's golden protection is crucial to stunning him and gaining an advantage.
